Text: My upload speed is modest, so be patient ...
zlo666..about that day 10...my bad. it was actually day 9. Did anyone else have the sound go out? I'll try it again.
BIG THANXS BRINGING KYUSHU BASHO FOR EVERY SUMO FAN :)
Thank you so much! Can't wait for FEB 08! As everyone else, we can not say to you how much your time and effort is so appreciated by all of us!
I downloaded day 9 for a second time, but the same craps out about half way through. Anyone else have this problem?
Yes, thank you again for the Kyushu Basho. Thank you very much.
I agree, extra thanks out to you for making these available. Most of us can't get them. Do you think you'll be doing Jan 08?
As for day9, I just checked an original recorded mpeg, and it looks like there is no sound in the original also, so can't help you there :(

s'ok, we appreciate all the hard work you've done. i certainly hope Jan '08 is in the cards.
thanks again!
The ranking are out for Jan 08 btw all. http://sumo.goo.ne.jp/eng/index.html

Hello ZLO. I hear that Eurosport channel will stop showing sumo this jan-2008. Are you in Japan or Europe? How are all us fans of yours and Sumo looking for Jan '08? Thanks so much for all you do ZLO!

I'm joining to SciFi-Sumo.

Eurosport channel will stop showing sumo.... :(

zlo666, will you planning to upload January basho here?
As of right now, Dec 27, we are 16 Days, 09 Hours, 48 Mins from the Hatsu Basho. Can we hope your DVR will be working ZLO? Thanks for all you do!

I just found out that the Comcast in my area (Maryland, USA) will be getting TV Japan (NHK World Premium) as a premium channel ($25) 
in the next month or two. It's currently an "On Demand" premium in one Maryland County.  Folks with Comcast might want to check and see if they will also be getting this premium channel option. I'll keep folks posted, but it won't happen in time for the January basho. So zlo666, we're still counting on you bro. But fear not, if I can get NHK Sumo, I can try and copy and upload the days if you want a break.
Joe

Good news Joe!

Happy New Year to ALL! :)
Wow! Thank you so much Joe. I hope we hear good news for Jan Basho from ZLO soon. We are soooo bad at waiting! Thanks everyone for all you do for us SUMO fans world wide!
Less than 2 day to the Hatsu Basho! Can we hope that ZLO will be uploading our daily fix? Thanks so much!
The Hatsu Basho is here! Please let us know if you are getting it ZLO. Thanks 1 million times!

Yeah, I'm gettin' it, everything is under control ;)
Patience my friends, patience... 1st day will be up in a couple of hours...
Ha! Way to go Zo!
Ha! Way to go Zlo!
ZLO - You are the man. No, really you are the man. Thanks are just not enough. We are in your debt!
Doesn't anybody have May 19, 2007? I saw sumo on that day and would like to download it.
